title: Army Officer: Without Effective Camouflage, Some Soldiers 'Don't Come Home'
teaser: NPR's Audie Cornish talks with retired Army officer and camouflage expert Tim O'Neill about the Army's newest camouflage pattern, why it's better than the current design and the future of camouflage.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
